mapper.select: select * from eb_community where c_name like '%'||#{c_name}||'%'
select * from eb_community_post, eb_community where cp_community = c_no and c_no=#{c_no} order by cp_date desc
select * from eb_community_post where cp_owner = #{cp_owner} order by cp_date desc

select * from eb_community_post, eb_community_reply where cp_no = cr_cp_no and cr_owner = #{cr_owner} and cr_date = ( select max(cr_date) from eb_community_reply where cr_owner = #{cr_owner} and cp_no = cr_cp_no ) order by cp_date desc
select * from eb_community_post where cp_title like '%'||#{cp_seach}||'%' or cp_contents like '%'||#{cp_seach}||'%' order by cp_date desc
select * from eb_community_reply, eb_community_post where cr_cp_no = cp_no and cp_no=#{cp_no} order by cr_date asc
select count(*) from eb_community_reply where cr_cp_no = #{no}
mapper.update: update eb_community_post set cp_title = #{cp_title} , cp_contents = #{cp_contents} where cp_no = #{cp_no}
